Description: this variable has all fields filled in
this variable has almost no fields filled in, but is identical to scalar1
this variable is the same as scalar1, but is activated
this variable is scaled to be roughly of order 1
variables don't have to be design variables, they can also just be parameters
note that the case doesn't matter for the design variable flag
this is an example of a vector parameter
scalars and/or vectors can be used for any field
we can even use only part of an array as a design variable
all values can also be input as generic Julia code
the shape of vectors and matrices will be preserved
we can also include other types of variables as design parameters
integers will be converted to floats when used as design variables
some types of variables like strings cannot be design variables
